View¶

class proteus.view.main_window.MainWindow(project_path=None, project_title=None, clean=False)¶

Main window class.

add_object(obj) → None¶

Adds a child to the selected object.

Parameters:

obj – The object to be cloned and inserted.

closeEvent(event)¶

Detects the close window event and shows a warning message box, if the project is not saved.

create_dock_windows() → None¶

Creates dock windows.

create_document_inspector() → None¶

Creates document inspector tree.

create_visualizer_widget() → None¶

Creates and loads visualizers.

load_ribbon() → Ribbon¶

Loads ribbon menu.

Returns:

ribbon widget.

preferences() → None¶

Opens the preferences dialog.

class proteus.view.actions.redo_action.RedoAction¶

Class where is located the action (QAction) of redo.

getAction(ribbon: Ribbon) → QAction¶

Method that create the action (QToolButton) create a new project. :returns: Redo Action :rtype: QAction

class proteus.view.actions.undo_action.UndoAction¶

Class where is located the action (QAction) of undo.

getAction(ribbon: Ribbon) → QAction¶

Method that create the action (QToolButton) create a new project. :returns: Undo Action :rtype: QAction
